column2:
"No, that was amazing!
Your moves have been burned into my mind.
I'm jealous of what good experience you're gaining!"

"So I guess with an enemy like that, it's best
to use some kind of move that can take 'em
all out in one fell swoop!"

"I'm gonna remember that for future use!
Thanks, friend!"

"いやほんとスゴかったなぁー！
動きがオレの目に焼き付いてるよ。
いい経験を積めてうらやましいぜ！"

"やっぱ、ああいう相手には
一気にどかんと蹴散らす技で
一網打尽、だよな！"

"オレも参考にさせてもらうぜ！
ありがとな！"
